titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation concerning the acts of navigation and encouragement of trade
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at White-hall, the six and twentieth day of August, 1663, in the fifteenth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
